extendedInfo.description: Would you like to have fun drawing Minecraft? That is exactly what the How to Draw: Minecraft app allows you to do. Add this latest offering in the series of drawing apps and never worry about boredom again!Drawing is fun, but traditionally not so fun to learn. Unless you can afford a private tutor, you usually have to take a class that requires you to adhere to a specific schedule.  The How to Draw: Minecraft app makes learning to draw as easy and as flexible as possible. All you need to provide is time, medium, and environment in which you want to draw!The How to Draw: Minecraft app includes a collection of tutorials for drawing the most common minecraft characters and objects. If you are a fan of crafting some staff in Minecraft word, we sure you will like crafting real images on your own. You can choose one, two, three, or all of the images to draw. The choice is yours!The How to Draw: Minecraft app makes learning to draw a snap by using mimicking, a method of drawing that is ideal for both beginners and advanced artists. Simply follow the step-by-step instructions provided for your selected object. You will learn to draw in no time!--- Minecraft --- The following is a list of the minecraft characters and objects that you can draw with the How to Draw: Minecraft app:-  Cake from Minecraft-  Ghast from Minecraft-  Creeper from Minecraft-  Enderman from Minecraft-  Steve from Minecraft-  Zombie from Minecraft-  Herobrine from Minecraft-  Chicken from Minecraft-  Sheep from Minecraft-  Whithers from Minecraft-  Pig from Minecraft-  Wolf from Minecraft-  Cow from Minecraft-  Skeleton from Minecraft-  Spider from Minecraft	--- Features ---The following is a list of the features that you can expect with the How to Draw: Minecraft app:- Free to use!- Portable so you can learn to draw wherever you take your mobile device!- One of the largest collections of tutorials for drawing celebrities in a single app!- Easy to follow step-by-step instructions for each tutorial!- Each tutorial associated with a rating so you can choose according to your drawing level!- Navigation controls that allow you to learn at your own pace!Try How to Draw: Minecraft today!
